message.content: {"given_definition_quality":30,"better_definition":"to write","sentence":"我写。","image_prompt":"A young girl sits at a simple desk, holding a pencil and looking thoughtfully at a blank piece of paper, with a faint, gentle glow from a lamp illuminating her face and hand.
